info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 2:22PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Fulton, west central Saratoga and east central Montgomery Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 222 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Galway, or 7 miles northeast of Amsterdam, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, pea size hail, and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roadways. Locations impacted include... Hagaman, Galway, Rock City Falls, Parkis Mills, Shaw Corners, Barkersville, West Milton, Glenwild, Wiley Corners, West Galway, Whiteside Corners, North Milton, Frink Corner, Hagedorns Mills, West Corners, Mosherville, West Charlton, Union Mills, Skinner Corners and Shuttleworth Corners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
